hero.description_part1: 5000m² of Unparalleled Luxury in the Heart of Baku
hero.description_part2: Where tradition meets innovation. Discover premium fitness with complete cultural sensitivity, including dedicated women's facilities designed for privacy and comfort.

about.section_description: Where Azerbaijani hospitality meets world-class wellness. Experience the future of fitness in a space designed for those who demand excellence.
about.redefining_text1: Crown Wellness Club stands as First interactive fitness in Azerbaijan truly luxury fitness destination. We understand the importance of cultural sensitivity while delivering an uncompromising premium experience.
about.redefining_text2: Our 5000m² facility features dedicated spaces that respect local values, including private women's training areas, while offering the latest in international fitness and wellness technology.
about.cultural_description: Dedicated women's training facilities with complete privacy, ensuring comfort and cultural consideration for all our members.
about.feature1_description: First interactive fitness, luxury wellness in the heart of Baku
about.feature2_description: International quality meets local cultural values
about.feature3_description: Join Baku's most discerning fitness enthusiasts

services.section_description: Six distinct zones of luxury, each crafted to deliver world-class experiences while honoring Azerbaijan's cultural values.
services.cultural_banner_description: Our women's facilities span 800m² of completely private space, designed with deep respect for Azerbaijan's cultural values. Featuring dedicated female trainers, private changing areas, and women-only class schedules, we ensure comfort and modesty without compromising luxury.

fitness_zone.subtitle: 5 Premium Studios
fitness_zone.description: State-of-the-art equipment from leading international brands with dedicated spaces for every fitness discipline.

spa_zone.subtitle: Ultimate Recovery
spa_zone.description: Premium wellness treatments in a serene environment designed for complete rejuvenation and cultural comfort.

beauty_zone.subtitle: Aesthetic Excellence
beauty_zone.description: Professional beauty services with luxury finishes, featuring premium brands and expert stylists.

womens_zone.subtitle: Private & Exclusive
womens_zone.description: Exclusive 800m² space designed with complete privacy and cultural consideration for women's comfort and modesty.

fitbar.subtitle: Nutrition Hub
fitbar.description: Premium nutrition center with expert-crafted meals and supplements to fuel your wellness journey.

wellness_shop.subtitle: Premium Retail
wellness_shop.description: Curated selection of premium wellness and fitness products from international luxury brands.

membership.section_description: Choose your path to luxury wellness. Each membership is crafted to deliver exceptional value and exclusive experiences in Azerbaijan's premier destination.

membership.guarantee_text: Join as a founding member of First interactive fitness in Azerbaijan luxury wellness club and enjoy exclusive benefits, priority access, and the prestige of being among the first to experience Crown excellence.

statistics.section_description: First interactive fitness in Azerbaijan luxury wellness club sets unprecedented standards with world-class facilities and cultural excellence.
statistics.achievement_description: Pioneering the future of premium fitness and wellness in Baku with unprecedented luxury, cultural sensitivity, and world-class amenities. Setting new standards that honor both international excellence and local values.

contact.section_description: Ready to begin your luxury wellness journey? Contact us today and discover what makes Crown Wellness Club Azerbaijan's premier destination.
